PrecisDIRECTION TO THE CRTC (INELIGIBILITY OF NON-CANADIANS) which makes a number of amendments to the Direction, most notably to raise the maximum allowable foreign investment in broadcasting firms to 33.3% of the voting shares at the holding company level, up from the current maximum of 20%.
